name: HockeyKit
summary: A software update kit for iOS.
description: Hockey is a iOS Ad-Hoc updater framework. It can be used for all apps that target the Apple AppStore and improves the beta testing process dramatically. NOTES: You will need to add a dependency on JSONKit or SBJson yourself. If you want the framework to try again when a network is available, add a dependency on Reachability and send a notification with the name `NetworkDidBecomeReachable` yourself when the network becomse reachable.
